1.「あー！ あいつですー！| あいつが 手強い旅芸人ですよー！: Aah! That's him! He's a formidable traveling|entertainer!

2.「フォッフォッフォ 感じます……。| 私の弟弟子ポルファンと 同じオーラを。: Ffffff. I can feel it... It's the same as my|brother Porphan...

3.「あなたは ポルファンの弟子ですね。| 役立たずのゲイザーより お強いようで。|: You are Porphan's apprentice... You are|stronger than the useless Gazer... I like...|Stronger...

But, you know, the rest... I don't like it.|Traveling entertainers who do stupid|tricks... I don't know what to say... I can't|
|stand them...

5.「もうね 好き嫌いの問題ではないです……。| 生理的にダメ。つまらん芸とか ナン:
It's not a matter of liking or disliking...|Physiologically... I don't understand... I|don't understand how anyone can laugh at|
|that...

6.「もうね ホント世の中どうかしてますよ。| どいつもこいつも つまらん芸で笑って:
I mean, what's wrong with the world? It's|crazy that my taste doesn't work when|everyone else is laughing at their boring|
|tricks.

7.「で 結論。なにが言いたいのかというとですね。| 旅芸人は この世から消えてくだ:
So... I guess what I'm trying to say is...|Traveling entertainers must disappear from|this world... If they don't disappear, I'll|
|kill them myself...

8.「キャッ キャッ♪| ボクたちも 殺したいですー♪: ♪ Ooh, ooh, ooh ♪| We want to kill you too

9.「ボクたち ルルルリーチ様の特訓で| ちょー 強くなったぜー♪: We were trained by Master Lulu Leach| I'm getting stronger

11.「私 好きなんですよ。命をかけた戦いが。| 芸も 似たようなものですよね？| フ: I like to... The art of... The art is|similar, isn't it? Whoa, whoa, whoa. Now,|let's have some fun...

12.「あなた また来たんですか？| あれだけ 痛めつけてさしあげたのに| まだ 私の: You've come again? After all I've done to|you, you still want my whip, don't you?

13.「フォッフォッフォ うれしいです。| 私 好きなんですよ。弱い者をいたぶるのが。: Whoo-hoo-hoo! I'm so happy... I like to... I|like... tormenting the weak... It's nice of|you to help me with my hobby.

14.「フォッフォッフォ。さあ 楽しませてください。| 私は まだまだ 満足していませ: Fo-fo-fo... Come on, let's have some fun...|I'm still not satisfied...

15.「……フォッフォッフォ。お強いですね。| しかし 悲しいことですが 才能ある者は: ... Fofo... You are strong... But sadly, the|gifted are discriminated against in this|world...

16.「私は ポルファンより 才能がありましたが| 魔物の芸など ウケるわけなく どこ: I was more talented than Porphan, but my|demon tricks were never popular, and wherever|I went, my tricks were never accepted...

17.「しかし 自分より才能のない多くの旅芸人が| 成功している……。私は絶望しました:
But there are so many less talented and more|successful traveling entertainers out|there... I was in despair... I began to|
|resent my art.

18.「フォッフォッフォ。才能が あったところで| 世の中は それを正しくは評価しませ: Whoa... Even if you had talent, the world|wouldn't value it properly, you know?

19.「あなたは 自分の才能が認められなくても| くさらずに 笑いの道を極められますか: Even if your talent is not recognized, will|you still be able to master the art of|laughter?<yesno><close>

20.「フォッフォッフォ。そうでしょうね……。| そのように 強い心を持った旅芸人など: Fofo... I'm sure... There is no traveler on|earth with such a strong heart...
